mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED (UID, FEED_ID, WRITE_DATE, BOOK_ID, REPORT, FEED_LIKE, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME) SELECT #{uid}, IFNULL(MAX(FEED_ID) + 1, 0), NOW(), #{bookId}, #{report}, 0, NOW(), NOW() FROM FEED WHERE UID = #{uid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FEED WHERE UID = #{uid} AND FEED_ID = #{feedId}
